website_summaries.verdict: Small supply of protein powder that is good for the occasional healthy snack throughout the day.
pros: Completely allergen friendly since it uses organic ingredients free of any harmful chemicals
Provides a healthy amount of iron
Can be used with water, rice, milk, and other beverages with just a couple teaspoons
cons: Powder can be difficult to dissolve thoroughly in some liquids

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is horrible....I don't understand why it's one of Amazon's choices. It doesn't blend well and tastes horrible. If your looking for a vanilla flavored vegan protein powder, go with Designs for Health vanilla pea protein. It's more expensive but totally worth it...
customer_reviews.author: danessa

customer_reviews.title: I love that it makes me feel full and holds me ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying this protein powder. I love that it makes me feel full and holds me ultill lunch time just by mixing it with water. I have also used it as a full meal replacement just add some almond milk fruit and spinach or any other leafty green you prefer. Its consistency can sometimes be grainy but i notice that it taste more like that when the shake is not cold enough or not properly shaken or when you let it sit for too long.
customer_reviews.author: Meld

customer_reviews.title: Tasty & Good for your Health
customer_reviews.text: Best tasting plant-based protein powder that I have ever had. Mixes easily with milk and is easy on your stomach. I'll be a lifetime customer to this product as long as they keep producing it with such quality.
customer_reviews.author: Brown Face

customer_reviews.title: Makes great breakfast shakes
customer_reviews.text: Best protein powder I have found. Been using for about a year now. It doesn't have as horrible of a flavor as most other protein powders. I like to blend mine with some raw oats, peanut butter, cinnamon and flax milk for breakfast.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Y

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Not bad considering its a plant protein. It is a bit thick and I suggest adding more liquid to balance it out. This is the best tasting so far that I've tried. I've tried Vega and Orgain and didn't like those
customer_reviews.author: Paul Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I couldn’t find the brown rice powder. It doesn’t taste bad but I do like the brown rice powder better. I won’t buy again but I will finish the container.
customer_reviews.author: Marvel Mom

customer_reviews.title: i will continue to purchase and recommend to
customer_reviews.text: does not completely disolve. grainy texture. i have been using guar gum as a smoother - thickner to make it more palettable. even with the texture issue, i will continue to purchase and recommend to others
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... Rice Protein power for our morning protein drink and love it as does my husband who doesn't have a ...
customer_reviews.text: When I realized what milk products were doing to me (causing inflammation in my stomach) I switched to Pea and Rice Protein power for our morning protein drink and love it as does my husband who doesn't have a problem with milk or whey. I have tried others and just couldn't handle the chalky taste.
customer_reviews.author: Thmabz

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor and perfect consistency for mixing!
customer_reviews.text: The Vanilla Blast is a great flavor! After a few tubs it can start to get old of course but every time I branch out to another brand I come away disappointed. I may end up purchasing the plain in order to mix up my own flavors.. The consistency is perfect for thorough mixing; none of that feeling like you are drinking sand.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. The Vanilla flavor is not overpowering. Only wish they had larger container sizes.
customer_reviews.author: William P Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: This makes the best morning breakfast shakes
customer_reviews.text: This makes the best morning breakfast shakes. I feel satisfied but not bloated like I would with whey protein. I also add powdered peanut butter for additional protein. This is also great after workouts mixed with almond milk.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla J Sorich

customer_reviews.title: Happy tummy.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product not for the taste but for the ease of digestion. This is great in smoothies but would not recommend as a stand alone. It digest really well without making you feel weighed down or bloated like whey protein can. Great vegan option.
customer_reviews.author: Tityina Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favorite protein powder so far. It is easy on my tummy and has a good flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Lora D

customer_reviews.title: Excellent flavor but would like to see it less sweet
customer_reviews.text: Excellent flavor but would like to see it less sweet, perhaps one gram of coconut sugar per scoop instead of three. The price is reasonable and will continue to order this in the future. It is organic and made from US and Canadian sources.
customer_reviews.author: Paticakes

customer_reviews.title: Vegan
customer_reviews.text: Good taste, blends well with water or milk . I like almond milk the best.
customer_reviews.author: margaret askew

customer_reviews.title: Growing Naturals Pea Protein Powder, Vanilla Blast, 33.5 Ounce
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a great price! I will buy it again...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great protein powder/Mixes easily
customer_reviews.text: I needed a protein powder that didn't have any soy and I came across this product. Unlike other protein powders I have tried this powder actually does dissolve very easily. Put this in with my veggie/fruit smoothie. Works great! Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Hollywood7255

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat the price and purity of this product. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Shopandsave

customer_reviews.title: Very good protein powder
customer_reviews.text: Very good protein powder. I was searching for a quality protein with a good flavor and I found it.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Good Supplement
customer_reviews.text: Like this protein powder. Using it in conjunction with Growing Naturals Organic Rice Protein Powder. Does at a bit of creaminess to the smoothie.
customer_reviews.author: sbower13

customer_reviews.title: Too sweet! Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Too sweet. Has coconut sugar & stevia in it, and it makes my fruit smoothies too sweet. I would not buy this again. I have used other brands in the past that I liked much better, without the sugar in it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Miller

customer_reviews.title: but they are easy to digest
customer_reviews.text: I can't compare this to other brands, having never tried the others -- but this stuff is rad. I thought I could not be vegan because, I could not eat legumes without getting gas. Peas are technically legumes, but they are easy to digest.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Benjamin Brown

customer_reviews.title: I used to use Plant Fusion until they changed the ...
customer_reviews.text: I used to use Plant Fusion until they changed the formula and it now contains saturated fat. This is a delicious plant protein powder and I will continue to order it!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Exner

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this protein and the taste, I do get headaches from the stevia in it though.
customer_reviews.author: ak7903

customer_reviews.title: Love this vegan protein powder
customer_reviews.text: Love this vegan protein powder! Wish it was a bit less sweet though. Does not cause any stomach upset, and my stomach is sensitive. Others have posted about dark spots in their product, but this is simply natural vanilla bean specks. Will continue buying.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L. Christ

customer_reviews.title: My go to breakfast
customer_reviews.text: This a great product, not grainy, mixes completely. I mix with unsweetened cashew milk, cocoa and smooth sun nut butter and throw in some chia seeds. That's my go to breakfast and it keeps me full for hours. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Julia S.

customer_reviews.title: Pea Protein
customer_reviews.text: Among the three different brands I have tried this one is my favorite and it mixes well with my shakes.
customer_reviews.author: Pierre Gadea

customer_reviews.title: I really didn't like this.
customer_reviews.text: I really didn't like this .. looking for a way to contact seller directly for return / partial refund
customer_reviews.author: P. Maxwell Ward

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great protein powder. Very easy to digest and the taste is mild and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Groszek

customer_reviews.title: Great Tasting Powder
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a few different Protein Powders, but this one tops them all. Great tasting and all natural. You would not be disappointed with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Faria

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best taste in vegan protein, love that it is only pea and the vanilla flavour is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: MARIA

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting pea protein EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this protein. It’s vegan, delicious, a good value for your money, blends well and doesn’t taste bad once the shake has sat for a few hours in the refrigerator. I make my daily shakes in the morning and by the time I have my mid afternoon shake, it’s still as delicious as the one in the morning. I am adding this to my monthly automatic shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Raine4llw

customer_reviews.title: Awesome protein supplement
customer_reviews.text: This stuff has a pretty good taste. It does make drinks a but chalky, but I'm totally ok with that. It has lysine and an acceptable amount of carbs per serving. It goes well with other supplements that I mix into shakes. It is even great just in a glass of some sort of milk. The vanilla flavor is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Grimnebulin

customer_reviews.title: As a protein source, sure.  I am good with it.
customer_reviews.text: I add this to my smoothies. (Vitamix it) No bloat and I am pleased that I am digesting non-GMO for a protein source. Yellow peas are safe, SO FAR. Monster Monsanto hasn't gotten to these beautiful yellow peas, yet. Taste is good. Keep in mind it is a protein powder. Sugar content is reasonable. I will certainly buy again. 4 stars due to not over the top yummy and the price is a bit high.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Great Supplement
customer_reviews.text: As a vegetarian, it is sometimes difficult to find protein rich foods.Growing Naturals Pea Protein is reasonably prices.The vanilla flavor is rich and true to taste with no lingering after taste. Despite which flavor you choose, they mix well with water in a blender bottle after 2-3 shakes. It will separate and thicken if you let it sit after mixing, but remixes very easy.Cleaning-up is also easy.
customer_reviews.author: Ellis

customer_reviews.title: I love, love, love this Vanilla Pea Powder!!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this vanilla pea powder!! I add sweetner and mix it with water only! Even one scoop with 3 cups water is delicious and loaded with protein!!
customer_reviews.author: Anna H.

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Good vegan protein powder. Not absolutely the most delicious thing I've ever tasted but it's good for a pre or post workout meal! I use it with unsweetened almond milk and 100% cocoa powder or unsw. almond milk, 1/2 frozen banana and a couple strawberries. Great base for adding what you want!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: My favorite protein drink! It doesn’t have a weird after taste and it’s vegan.
customer_reviews.author: RMC

customer_reviews.title: It definitely tastes like vegetables but I like vegetables so the taste isn't ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this product everyday. Sometimes I add cacao powder for a chocolate shake to have something different. I use very cold water with the powder because lukewarm shakes are not fabulous to me. It definitely tastes like vegetables but I like vegetables so the taste isn't repulsive to me. I have used 3 cans of this product and sometimes mix it with my green food supplement powder. I will continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: adrienne lynn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff - nice protein amount, good texture, blends well, good taste, no dairy, no gluten. Works for me!
customer_reviews.author: Zepman

customer_reviews.title: but I do not like the taste
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for the price, but I do not like the taste, Naturmade tastes much better but I wish they were less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Excellent non-soy protein
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for making non-soy smoothies or just a great protein drink.
customer_reviews.author: Storm Angelyn

customer_reviews.title: Less tasty than Rice Protein but does the job
customer_reviews.text: Not as tasty as the rice protein, and not as much protein per serving, but it still served its purpose
customer_reviews.author: J W

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Adds a nice sweet taste to my smoothie. And gives it some staying power.
customer_reviews.author: careful shopper

customer_reviews.title: I don't love this protein powder
customer_reviews.text: I don't love this protein powder, I prefer a thicker shake consistency, this one is very thin and the flavor is not great either, I will not purchase again
customer_reviews.author: youaskitell

customer_reviews.title: Great taste for  healthful  smoothies,
customer_reviews.text: First time to try Pea Protein Powder, very rich and creamy, a nice change from hemp protein powder. I cannot tolerate whey, so this fits the bill. I will purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: hunter1225

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Tastes good and has a large amount of protein. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Anda

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Easy on the stomach, unlike whey protein. Part of my morning smoothie, along with Growing Naturals Rice protein.
customer_reviews.author: wisconsinite.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because of food allergies to Whey. It’s an acceptable substitute but taste just isn’t there
customer_reviews.author: Todd M.

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff. Mixes well in smoothies. One of my kids mixes it with milk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love the taste and how natural it is. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: LauraO

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the pea proteins with the best taste!
customer_reviews.author: Emerson L Gazzoli

product_meta.title: Growing Naturals | Plant Based Protein, Gold Standard Raw Pea Protein Powder | Vanilla Blast | Non-GMO, Vegan, Gluten-Free, Keto Friendly, Shelf-Stable | 1LB
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Vanilla Blast| Size:1 PoundGreat product for maximum health benefits.
feature_bullets: GOLD STANDARD RAW PEA PROTEIN | An exzyme-rich plant with high digestibility. Our protein is packed with powerful higher branched chain amino acids than other vegetable proteins. Shelf-stable quality protein, the perfect replacement for animal-based protein

LIFESTYLE & FOOD ALLERGY-FRIENDLY | Free of gluten (verified by batch), soy, dairy, corn & lactose. Our pea protein is non-GMO verified, vegan & Kosher. Manufacturing process uses NO chemical solvents to separate & concentrate natural protein

MAKE ANY MEAL HIGH PROTEIN | Mix this sustainably sourced, Earth-friendly protein into soups, sauces, oatmeal, pancakes, muffins & more. With only 6g of carbs and 3g of sugar it is the perfect natural supplement for muscle growth and maintaining a balanced diet

NATURALLY NUTRITIOUS | Highest plant source per gram of protein for Lysine, benefiting tissue, bone and antibody development. Fill your protein needs, feel full, and provide 25-30% of your daily iron per serving. Perfect building block for our immune system

FOR THE HEALTHY MINDED | Our products are made with plant-based proteins designed to fuel people who thoughtfully select what goes in their bodies, whether by choice or necessity, from Vegans to those managing Celiac. Scroll down to learn more
